ERP for Garment Industry

Streamline your garment manufacturing operations with our industry-specific ERP solution designed for the complexities of textile and apparel production.

Overview

Our ERP for Garment Industry is a comprehensive enterprise resource planning solution specifically developed to address the unique challenges of garment manufacturing. From design and development to production planning and delivery, our system provides end-to-end visibility and control over your entire manufacturing process.

Key Features

Production Planning & Management

  • Production scheduling and capacity planning
  • Order management and tracking
  • Bill of Materials (BOM) management
  • Work order creation and monitoring
  • Quality control and inspection

Inventory Management

  • Raw material inventory tracking
  • Fabric and trim management
  • Finished goods inventory
  • Warehouse management system
  • Automatic reorder point calculation

Supply Chain Management

  • Vendor management and evaluation
  • Purchase order automation
  • Supplier performance tracking
  • Import/export documentation
  • Logistics and shipping coordination

Costing & Financial Management

  • Accurate product costing

  • Profit margin analysis
  • Cost center management
  • Financial reporting and analytics
